description:
Since this change: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/10574, we require that all volumes that were created by openstack need to be tagged 'osvol'. This is later used to determine whether they should be destroyed when the VM is terminated.

Boot from volume does not tag volumes, which causes them to be deleted on termination.
title: xenapi: volume not tagged in boot from volume case
